In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. Mike Pence sent this message to supporters on his political e-mail list this afternoon: Friends and Supporters, Over the past few months, my family and I have been grateful for the encouragement we have received to consider other opportunities to serve our state and our nation in the years ahead. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home.
